header.name: Avinash Bhutani
header.description: Hey there! I'm Avinash, a generalist who loves solving complex problems. I graduated with a BTech in Electrical Engineering from IIT Delhi. Being fascinated by startups and passionate about teaching, I have worked with edtech startups ever since. Currently, I'm at Better Ed Co (pixicook.com), where we're building a cool learning product among other cooking products. I enjoy reading science, diving into abstract ideas, and occasionally penning down my thoughts.

experience.description: Leading product work at cooking.app to help you become confident home cooks. Apart from leading product efforts for our learning product, I also led analytics across all products in the organization. I have been tinkering with and embedding LLMs in product workflows.

Developed an alternate sales strategy as a quick experiment for the US/International market. Improved trial class request to teacher slot matching from 75% to 88% on platform and to 94% off platform using rigorous data analytics. Enhanced feedback and input response rate from roughly 25% (via WhatsApp, max reach ~50 teachers) to 65% (on platform, max reach - all active teachers).

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Electrical, Electronics and Communications Engineering

projects.title: Visible Light Communication
projects.description: Devised a new coding-decoding scheme for flicker mitigation over a 5kbps data-rate. Enhanced the scheme to support dimming over a 60% intensity band, limiting flickering statistically. Simulated existing modulation schemes to match BER, BW, and PSD with theoretical results. Derived PSDs analytically and numerically for various coding schemes.

projects.title: Autonomous Robots - DL1234
projects.description: Implemented vision-based localization using Logitech webcam and OpenCV's Aruco Marker-based libraries. Developed and implemented a sensor fusion model based on the Extended Kalman Filter (EKF) to improve robot localization. Used OptiTrack Motive to track robot motion and compare regular odometry-based pose with EKF-based estimated pose.

volunteer.description: One of my students qualified JEE Mains and ended up joining DTU.
